name: formpilot
description: Chrome extension + local Python service for PDF form autofill

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:extension && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:extension && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:extension && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules extension/node_modules shared/node_modules backend/__pycache__ backend/.pytest_cache
